snippet: Cory Schneider made 26 saves, Mike Cammalleri had a tiebreaking goal in the third period, and the Devils beat the Lightning.
abstract: New Jersey Devils beat Tampa Bay Lightning, 2-1.
lead_paragraph: Cory Schneider made 26 saves, Mike Cammalleri had a tiebreaking goal in the third period, and the Devils beat the Lightning.

headline.main: Devils Win Third Straight on Road
headline.print_headline: Devils Win Third Straight on Road
